author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Futong Technology Development Holdings Expects Loss Attributable For Year Ended 31 Dec 2017
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Futong Technology Development Holdings Ltd:
* IS EXPECTED TO RECORD A LOSS ATTRIBUTABLE TO OWNERS OF COMPANY FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO ‍INCREASE IN ADMINISTRATIVE AND FINANCIAL EXPENSES OF APPROXIMATELY 20-25%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
